course_description: A gentle introduction to programming problem-solving for absolute beginners. Each day builds upon the previous, creating a solid foundation in computational thinking and basic algorithms.

unit_1.title: Getting Started with Problem Solving
unit_1.description: Learn the basics of breaking down problems and thinking algorithmically

unit_2.title: Intermediate Concepts & Practice
unit_2.description: Dive deeper into data manipulation and more complex problem solving
